notes:
V3.22.0 — 27.02.2026
────────────────────────
• This release includes important bug fixes to address issues introduced after recent platform changes

V3.20.26 — 27.02.2026
────────────────────────
• Fixed an issue affecting message retrieval (getMessages) due to internal structural changes.
• Resolved an invalid ID (WID) value error when handling certain objects or opening chats.
• Fixed a sending issue when delivering messages to specific LID-based identifiers, improving overall message stability.
(Note: This update is intended for the official versions WaSender 3.7.0 and WaCRM 3.3.0. Users running modified or unofficial versions may experience issues.)

V3.20.25 — 26.02.2026
────────────────────────
• WaSender 3.7.0 & WaCRM 3.3.0 (Official Versions): Fixed an issue affecting some users where group member extraction was not working properly or returning incomplete results in certain cases.
• Fixed a messaging issue where some recipients were being skipped when sending standard messages, Quick Replies, or Auto Reply messages, ensuring that all selected contacts now receive messages without exception.
• Improved the number extraction mechanism from groups, chats, and Labels, resolving cases where incorrect or unusual IDs were returned. The system now accurately retrieves real phone numbers.
• Enhanced overall sending stability and ensured accurate targeting of the correct phone number for each message, with improved reliability during campaigns and bulk sending.
• (Note: This update is intended for the official versions WaSender 3.7.0 and WaCRM 3.3.0. Users running modified or unofficial versions may experience issues.)

V3.20.24 — 20.02.2026
────────────────────────
• WaSender & WaCRM: Fixed an issue where media attachments (Images, Videos, and Audio) were failing to send in standard messages, Quick Replies, and Auto Reply mode.

V3.20.23 — 15.02.2026
────────────────────────
• Official WaSender 3.7.0 Update: Fixed and restored the Social Media Data Extraction feature from search engines and social platforms, resolving the previous failure and ensuring complete data retrieval.

V3.20.22 — 14.02.2026
────────────────────────
• Official WaSender 3.7.0 Update: Fixed the ChromeDriver auto-update issue to ensure the correct official version is downloaded properly.
• Fixed Google Maps data extraction when using the Old Classic UI (legacy browser mode), resolving rating and data duplication issues.
(Users running unofficial or modified versions may experience issues; this update is intended only for the official latest version 3.7.0.)

V3.20.21 — 14.02.2026
────────────────────────
• WaSender: Fixed an issue affecting some users where group member number extraction was inconsistent or partially failing, and also resolved a related issue with extracting active group members.

V3.20.2 — 26.01.2026
────────────────────────
• WaSender: Fixed an issue with extracting data from Google Maps.
• GMExtractor: Added update support for future releases and fixed data extraction issues from Google Maps.
• Fixed an issue where messages sent by Auto Reply were not marked as read in WaCRM and WaSender.

V3.19.72 — 16.01.2026
────────────────────────
• Fixed an issue where List Messages were not sent correctly in Auto Reply mode.

V3.19.71 — 15.01.2026
────────────────────────
• Fixed an issue where messages sent to new contacts were delivered but the chat did not appear or open correctly.

V3.19.46 — 02.01.2026
────────────────────────
• Fixed an issue where the program could freeze during scanning when reaching the contact verification stage inside WaDefender.

V3.19.45 — 21.12.2025
────────────────────────
• Comprehensive fix for Welcome Messages and Quick Replies to ensure media and messages are delivered successfully to new numbers and Ad leads.
• Fixed messaging issues when contacting users selected via Labels.
• New organized UI: Added a smart folding feature for Quick Reply buttons to save screen space, with an option to pin frequently used replies.
